name: Read Only Memories: Double Pack
summary: Includes two downloadable soundtracks inside! Dive into the vibrant world of Neo-San Francisco with this Double Pack, featuring "2064: Read Only Memories" and its sequel, "Read Only Memories: NEURODIVER." In "2064," you'll solve a gripping mystery involving the first sapient machine and a missing inventor in a city full of diverse characters and branching narratives. Continue the adventure in "NEURODIVER" as psychic agent ES88, using a powerful Neurodiver to hunt down a rogue psychic entity hiding in people's memories. Experience both games' unique blend of retro aesthetics, immersive storytelling, and captivating soundtracks.
